name: elemental-spirit-air-xphb
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of elemental-spirit-air-xphb, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of elemental-spirit-air-xphb with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Imagine a heroic scene in the world of medieval fantasy tabletop games, reminiscent of Dungeons and Dragons. Focus on representing a unique creature that embodies the elemental spirit of air, characterized by unique limbs and emphasized musculature. This creature is caught in a blended environment that merges the underwater phenomena with the sky. Its gear is grounded in medieval aesthetics, omitting any modern tech. Include a human silhouette for scale comparison. Patrons would appreciate the painterly, consistent style invoked throughout the illustration. The color palette should encapsulate the feel of an aquatic setting - teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and pearlescent highlights. Emphasize the concept of motion visually, creating an atmosphere of dynamic fluidity. This piece is to be a part of a collection, therefore, it should encapsulate a sense of aquatic fantasy realism: conveying subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, and pressure-dome materials. The resolution needs to be high, keeping artifacts at bay. Avoid including any sort of text or symbols unless they carry a vital meaning. Finally, avoid including elements of modern signage, photorealistic CGI, anime style or bloom glare.
